casebody.data:
U.S. HOME CORPORATION, a Delaware Corporation, Appellant,
v.
Racal LANIER, Individually; the Micua Family Trust Dated July 5, 2006; Benigno B. Molina Living Trust; Edward P. Tuason; Azucena C. Tuason; and Dennis Williams, II, Individually, Respondents. No. 68692 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED NOVEMBER 28, 2018

REVERSED. REMAND.
